quote: Only in the agony of parting do we look into the depths of love. – George Eliot
fact: In 1912 a law passed in Nebraska where drivers in the country at night were required to stop every 150 yards, send up a skyrocket, wait eight minutes for the road to clear before proceeding cautiously, all the while blowing their horn and shooting off flares.
joke: Doctor you've got you help me, I'm addicted to twitter. Doctor: I don't follow you.
